Title: TfsGiggle - TFS SourceControl search
Description:
TfsGiggle makes it easier for developers to search for and find files in source control, based on source code contents (C# & C++), changeset id/committer/comment or associated workitems by id or title.

TfsGiggle is developed in C# and uses the Lucene.Net search engine.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
TfsGiggle makes it easier for developers to search for and find files in source control, based on source code contents (C# & C++), changeset id/committer/comment or associated workitems by id or title.

TfsGiggle is developed in C# and uses the Lucene.Net search engine.





All constructive feedback are most welcome :-)
